HLlpvtP_5CQ#17#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1: and by looking across the entire financial and non-financial system for potential risks and vulnerabilities these risks and vulnerabilities can include elevated valuation pressures excessive borrowing by households and businesses excessive leverage in the financial system and elevated funding risk in other words at the Federal Reserve we use both micro Prudential and macro-prudential approaches to monitor the health of financial institutions and the financial sector
the recent banking stress events remind us that risks and vulnerabilities in financial markets are continuously changing that is why the staff at the Federal Reserve is constantly monitoring the nest
